description: The 2025 Leonid meteor shower peaks on November 16-17, offering a prime viewing opportunity with a thin crescent moon and dark skies. Originating from comet 55P/Tempel-Tuttle, these fast-moving meteors will be visible from dark locations, with moderate activity expected. Scientists utilize these events for research into debris streams and atmospheric studies.

Project Prometheus aims to revolutionize manufacturing and engineering. It will focus on AI for sectors like aerospace and automotive. Top talent from OpenAI, DeepMind, and Meta have joined the startup. This venture marks Bezos's first operational role since leaving Amazon.

This sparked immediate backlash from workers citing long commutes, rising expenses, and constant after-hours communication. Employees emphasize that current long hours do not yield better results. They seek fair pay, predictable hours, and time for rest.

description: An obscure tweet from 2013 by online creator Marco Acortes, stating "Corona virus….its coming," gained widespread attention in 2020 when COVID-19 emerged. The post, which has not been edited, resurfaced again in 2025, sparking speculation about Acortes's prescience. He has since ceased all social media activity, leaving his current whereabouts and the inspiration behind the tweet a mystery.

title: IPL captaincy: 'Giving reviews to owners' - KL Rahul reveals toughest part
description: Indian cricketer KL Rahul finds IPL captaincy more taxing than international duty, citing extensive meetings and ownership reviews. The Indian batter revealed that the constant questioning from owners, often lacking cricket insight, leaves him mentally and physically drained post-tournament. Rahul, now a player for Delhi Capitals, has stepped down from captaincy.

description: Bangladesh's International Crimes Tribunal has sentenced ousted Prime Minister Sheikh Hasina to death for crimes against humanity. Found guilty of ordering killings and inciting violence during a student uprising, Hasina can appeal the verdict within sixty days. India may refuse extradition if the charges are deemed political, adding to Bangladesh's political uncertainty.

Hasina insists on facing charges in a legitimate court, highlighting her government's human rights achievements and economic growth.

description: Investigators are unraveling a sophisticated Jaish-e-Mohammed plot, allegedly masterminded by Dr. Shaheen Shahid, dubbed "Madam Surgeon." The module, involving Kashmiri doctors, planned coordinated strikes and a December 6th attack to "avenge" the Babri Masjid demolition. Financial trails and overseas meetings with ISI handlers are under scrutiny.

title: Kayla Nicole Accused of AI-Generated Apology as Internet Breaks It Down
description: Kayla Nicole faces renewed online backlash over decade-old offensive tweets. Her subsequent apology has ignited a debate, with accusations of using AI to craft her statement. Critics question the sincerity of her remorse, while others argue the focus should be on her growth and acknowledging past harm, not AI detection.

title: How to send WhatsApp messages without saving a contact on your phone
description: WhatsApp allows users to initiate chats without saving contacts by using Click to Chat links or the official "Chat on WhatsApp" button. This feature streamlines communication for temporary interactions and business inquiries, offering flexibility on both mobile and web platforms. Users can create custom links with pre-filled messages for added convenience.
